pullRequest.title: Add thank you to YourKit to the main project page
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
In order to obtain free opensource YourKit license we are asked to put the link to YourKit site:

To obtain a license a small free-form text endorsement should be placed of the project web site.
The endorsement should contain:


Attached YourKit logo and text that your open source project is using YourKit tools. Alternatively you can use use logo hosted at YourKit web-site https://www.yourkit.com/images/yklogo.png


Acknowledgment should contain a hyperlink reference to YourKit web site.


For example:
"YourKit supports open source projects with innovative and intelligent tools for monitoring and profiling Java and .NET applications.
YourKit is the creator of YourKit Java Profiler, YourKit .NET Profiler, and YourKit YouMonitor."

commit.message: Add thank you to YourKit to the main project page

nodes.bodyText: This is my wording, please check it
